alert.note: Alert for Saipan; Tinian (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 8:53AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Saipan and Tinian through 945 AM CHST... At 853 AM ChST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 36 miles northeast of San Roque to near Kagman to 18 miles south of San Jose (Tinian Municipality). Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Kagman around 910 AM ChST. Dandan and San Roque around 915 AM ChST. Tanapag, As Mahetog and Koblerville around 920 AM ChST. Garapan, China Town and Chalan Kanoa I around 925 AM ChST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Tangke, Maturana Hill, Kannat Tabla, Fanonchuluyan, Nanasu, Northern Tinian, As Palacios, Tapochao, I Naftan and Chacha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Tiyan Guam.
